attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.description: An almost invisibly fast attack that always goes first.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.description: The target is attacked with small flames.

attacks.name: Scratch
attacks.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target.

attacks.name: Vine Whip
attacks.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

attacks.name: Razor Leaf
attacks.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the target.

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

attacks.name: Tackle
attacks.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target.

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

attacks.name: Pound
attacks.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg.

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

attacks.name: Confusion
attacks.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force.

attacks.name: Rock Throw
attacks.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target.

attacks.name: Tackle
attacks.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target.

attacks.name: Bone Club
attacks.description: The user clubs the target with a bone.

attacks.name: Headbutt
attacks.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target.

attacks.name: Tackle
attacks.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target.

attacks.name: Lick
attacks.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage.

attacks.name: Night Shade
attacks.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage.

attacks.name: Tail Whip
attacks.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pok√©mon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.
